Hi,

 

downloaded source code.

Going into the examples folder and trying out the PASS Summit 2011 example gives the above error.

Throstur

Hi,
the problem is that IIS doesn't manage cxml extension.

I solved configuring MIME Type in IIS.

Extension
  • .cxml
    MIME Type
  • text/xml
Regards,
Gaetano
